scripts.start: npm run build-webui; npm run server;
scripts.build-webui: npm run build-webui-sass; npm run build-webui-uncss;
scripts.build-webui-sass: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules webui/scss/search.scss webui/css/search.css; node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules webui/scss/submission.scss webui/css/submission.css; node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules webui/scss/about.scss webui/css/about.css;
scripts.build-webui-uncss: uncss --htmlroot webui/ webui/index.html > webui/css/min.search.css; mv webui/css/min.search.css webui/css/search.css; uncss --htmlroot webui/ webui/submission/index.html > webui/css/min.submission.css; mv webui/css/min.submission.css webui/css/submission.css; uncss --htmlroot webui/ webui/about/index.html > webui/css/min.about.css; mv webui/css/min.about.css webui/css/about.css;
